job description:
The consultancy will support Rainforest Alliance’s work with a key private sector partner to design a global M&E system for assessing a supply chain. The consultant will create a “template” in the SAP Analytics Cloud software program to allow RA and other users to display monitoring and evaluation data in an interactive “dashboard” format. Dashboard design requires intermediate knowledge of data science and visualization and use of common data analytics and visualization software programs.

See full description and application instructions at
https://www.rainforest-alliance.org/careers/consultant-data-it-analytics
